modules.purpose: Attestations, drift detection, shadow gates, ablations

attest_clearance.evidence: Ed25519 signature over (actor_id, level, nonce, ts); optional TPM/IMa proof
attest_clearance.signature: attest_clearance(actor_id: str, claimed_level: str, nonce: bytes, ts: int) -> ClearanceAttestation

verify_clearance.signature: verify_clearance(att: ClearanceAttestation, required: str, now_ts: int) -> bool

defense_layers: Admission control: provenance, geometric sanity, density, novelty
Robust neighbor selection (trimmed k-NN, diversity, hysteresis)
Containment (geometric kill-switch, shard isolation, anchor rotation)
threat_models_addressed: Shadow-channel abuse (covert channels, deception, unauthorized influence)

constants.doc: Default security thresholds aligned with geometric gates and detectors.

functions.name: kappa

functions.doc: Validates that the anchor’s κ lies within the allowable region for required_clearance per CLEARANCE_KAPPA_THRESHOLDS.
functions.name: validate_geometric_clearance

functions.name: monitor_geometric_anomalies
